message: Let's start with a fair split. Accept and we can end the game early.
You rejected my fair offer, now it's my turn to make a better one!
You're trying to take advantage of me, but I'm not falling for it. I'll give you a slightly better deal this time.
You're still not giving me enough, but I'll give you another chance to make it right!
I'm not getting any younger, and the money's losing value by the minute. Let's split it 50/50 and call it a day.
